en.bdb: ‘I will serve him to the full extent, and that is my only desire. ‘If he asks me to fetch a glass of water, I will do that. ‘Listen my friends; I am a sacrifice to his elocution.

en.bdb: ‘Since my attachment with him, I have lost all my appetite as well as sleep ‘I am all for my lover and my lover is all for me.’(28)
